dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Internet Explorer 8
AutoDetectedOS: Windows 7
IIILanguage: en
IssueType: lr_courtorder
Language: en
companyname: The Duke and Duchess of Manchester
country_residence: US
courtorder_explain: Dear Google, Melinda Pillsbury foster has been stalking  
us for since September this year. She is really mentally ill. she has done  
fake emails and called the media and has been caught.Melinda has our  
childrens Birth cert and The Duke of Manchesters Birth cert on the Duke and  
doxie of manchester web blog. Melinda is also calling me a Whore by calling  
me a Doxie a whore on the internet, Melinda is also useing our photos to  
slander the family name. Melinda has distorted the family history and also  
had put we were divorced on the website. There are so many things libel on  
this site. Her entire family is trying to stop her and put her in a  
hospitol. Melinda has had a cease and desist order and she put this blog up  
the next day. We love Google we just need your help in stopping this woman  
Melinda pillsbury foster from talking or posting out public residence and  
our phone numbers.
The fbi is now involved also. They have helped take down several other of  
her sites on our family.

Sincerely,
The Duke and Duchess of Manchester.

full_name: Laura And Alex Montagu
geolocation: US
hidden_product: blogger
